# Allow all search engines to crawl the site
User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://www.thewildlandfirerecoveryfund.org/sitemap.xml

# Crawl-delay to be respectful of server resources
Crawl-delay: 1

# Disallow sensitive areas (if any in the future)
# Disallow: /admin/
# Disallow: /private/
